R0_BBD_Date.name: R0_BBD_Date
R0_BBD_Date.description: Derived and pseudo-anonymised month/year. Month and year components are combined into a date with day 15, then shifted by a participant-specific offset, and only the year and month of the shifted date are stored. If the month component is missing (and a year is present) the date is anchored at 1 July (day 1, month 7) of that year before shifting. If the year component is missing the derived value is null.
